original_text: As the lords of the Philistines were passing on by hundreds and by thousands, and David and his men were passing on in the rear with Achish,
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들의 수령들은 수백 명씩 수천 명씩 인솔하여 나아가고 다윗과 그의 사람들은 아기스와 함께 그 뒤에서 나아가더니

sentences.original_text: As the lords of the Philistines were passing on by hundreds and by thousands,
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 방백들이 수백과 수천으로 지나가고 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: and David and his men were passing on in the rear with Achish,
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들은 아기스와 함께 뒤에서 따라가고 있었다,
